snippet: The bargaining session had an all-or-nothing feel to it, but hopes soared that a settlement to the lengthy N.H.L. lockout could be close.
abstract: Bargaining session between the NHL and players' union has an all-or-nothing feel to it, but hopes soar that a settlement to the lengthy lockout could be close.
lead_paragraph: The bargaining session had an all-or-nothing feel to it, but hopes soared that a settlement to the lengthy N.H.L. lockout could be close.

headline.seo: N.H.L. and Players Union Meet Face to Face
headline.main: N.H.L. Meeting Yields Optimism Even as Players Vote on Whether to Renew a Threat
headline.print_headline: Meeting Yields Optimism Even as Players Vote on Whether to Renew a Threat
